# The `ErrorDiagnostic` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Class to represent an error holding a diagnostic with location information used when printing it. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a925eabdcf1eae8c8a3ce311a8cb16518}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::ErrorDiagnostic::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.
